data.actual_result: The username and discrim still stay and you can send request repeatedly.
data.expected_result: I don't really know what to expect but I'm guessing that the page should either close or the discrim and username should just vanish.
data.short_description: When you send a friend request to a person through the new add friends screen, the username and the discrim still stay even after the request has been sent.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the friends page. - Type in someone's usernames and discrim. - Send the request.
